NT.BGColorHint: Use 8 digits instead of 6 to set transparency, example #000000a0
NT.CantModifySettings: You need access to modify settings user permissions to continue this action
NT.DurationMultiplierHint: Multiplies the duration of the /narrate by the specified number
NT.Pause: Automatic scenery control when game is paused
NT.PermissionsHint: Sets the minimum-level access for the module funcionalities. Some actions may need the user to have permission to Modify Settings.
NT.Title: Narrator Tools
